entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who was not invisible, indicating he has a physical presence.

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as a person who quickly suggests a possible explanation for Harry's disappearance.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as a person who has experience and expertise in the field of Aurorship.

entities.name: auror

relationships.description: Harry left the grounds, indicating he was no longer present there.
Hermione is concerned about Harry's disappearance and wants to discuss it with him.
Ron looks at Moody with admiration, hoping to be told he has the makings of an Auror like Moody.
Moody aspires to have the job title of Auror.
